fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Debug a player’s house. They won’t get any notifications that night except for ones provided by you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target learns who the Unspy visited at night. The message states “The Unspy visited [Their target]”
-You can hear whispers (for the old spy nostalgia)
-This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (May win while dead)
